name: MEExtension
desc: A type that provides objects for manipulating email messages, such as performing actions on messages or blocking content when users view messages.

items.name: func handlerForContentBlocker() -> MEContentBlocker
items.desc: Returns an object that provides rules that the message viewer uses to block content.

items.name: func handlerForMessageActions() -> MEMessageActionHandler
items.desc: Returns an object that performs actions on mail messages as the system downloads them.

items.name: func handler(for: MEComposeSession) -> MEComposeSessionHandler
items.desc: Returns an object that participates in the composition of a mail message.

items.name: func handlerForMessageSecurity() -> MEMessageSecurityHandler
items.desc: Returns an object that applies security measures such as encryption and digital signatures to messages.
